1200640.name: Furry Shakespeare: Hamlet(s)
1200640.description:
Castle Elsinore has gone pretty radio silent about what exactly went down with Claudius and his extended family, and how the exchange of power exactly came to be. But now, rumors have begun to circle that one of two two Hamlet twins has returned. Are they here for revenge, or to try to find some spark of peace?

Find out.

Also includes a new character to interact with, as well as possibly romance.

To play this DLC:

- Download

- Play to the beginning of the first after-school section, and a new scene should appear that adds the character to the world map.
